attributes.action: Pay the classroom assistants on temporary contracts for 12 months!!!
attributes.additional_details: Because employees of the Education Authority are been mistreated and exploited and no-one is doing anything. It may have always happened, but that does not make it right. It’s 2022 not 1902.
attributes.background: Exploiting classroom assistants on temporary contracts and only paying them term time has to be STOPPED.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  It looks like you might be in Northern Ireland, where Education is devolved to the Assembly and the Executive.
